name: Low Cut Body Knit Dress In Red Passion
description:
Hand knit Body Knit dress made in a beautiful bold red/burgundy. Custom sizes are available. Check chart below. Dress is great for the Holidays, Valentine's Day or any day you want to feel sexy and wow yourself and him!

Model's Measurements:

Height: 5'7.5"
Bust: 31.5 inches (80.01cm)
Waist: 24 inches (60.96cm)
Hips: 36 inches (91.44cm)

Note: Model is a slim size 3. If you are a size 3 and like your body knit to fit loosely, this is how the body knit dress in 48 stitches will fit to your body frame. Please refer to the photos.

Body Knit Measurements:

Full Length: 43 inches (109.22cm)
Width 17.5 inches (44.45cm) no stretch
Body Knit stitches: 48
Fits sizes 4-7

Please refer to these body knit sizes to determine your size:

40 stitches - retail size 0-2
42 stitches - retail size 3-4
48 stitches - retail size 5-7
52 stitches - retail size 8-10
55 stitches - retail size 12-14
59 stitches - retail size 16
65 stitches - retail size 16-18
72 stitches - retail size 18-20

name: Vintage Button Earrings Cherry Rounds and Brass
description:
These gorgeous earrings are to die for! These are a lovely deep iridescent cherry color with a beautiful brass center design. Turn them in many directions in the light and see how beautiful the color bounces off the them. They also change hues in natural sunlight becoming brighter or darker in shade and other types of light. They are backed by an antique copper flat back earring post that is very secure with E6000 industrial adhesive! Buttons are a 1 inches button (2.54 cm) Be the first to have these unique earrings.

*colors may vary according to computer monitor*

name: Knit Bow Hair Accessory in Green Avocado with Wooden Button
description:
This lovely bow is hand knit with 100% cotton yarn in avocado. Bow has crochet trimming along outter edges, measuring 5 inches (12.7 cm). Hair bow has a single hair clip sewn to the back and is centered with a beautiful dark brown wooden button with sun pattern...

Color may vary according to computer monitor

name: Crochet Hat Striped Sports Cap
description:
ALL HATS ARE FOR BOTH MEN AND WOMEN. This fun sports cap is striped in tan green and white with a brown bill. This cap measures 22.5 inches and fits small, medium, and large head sizes. Bill can be worn flipped up or down for more or less shade. Model's head size is 22 inches.

*Head Circumferences in Inches*

Extra Small – 20 - 21 inches

Small – 21 – 22 inches

Medium – 22 – 22.5 inches (The average adult head size and fits most small, medium, and large heads.)

Large – 22.5 – 23 inches

Extra Large – 23 – 24 inches

Maintenance:
Dry Clean Only

name: Bold Vibrant Chunky Wooden Necklace Bracelet Set
description:
This big, beautiful and bold necklace and bracelet set is made from a mix of small and large wooden beads stained in vibrant earthy colors, some with Asian calligraphy. Bracelet and necklace is strung with elastic string for easy taking on and off. These wooden jewelry sets will last a lifetime.

*Colors may vary according to computer monitor.*
